TopicTitle: KSP 0.90 'Beta Than Ever' Grand Discussion Thread!

Articles.Content:
It's never too early to start

... ayup, all aboard the hype train for .91!

I don't think this is normal?

http://cloud-4.steampowered.com/ugc/538508994144833201/081DB42FAD0E352D6979EF84A6D1350E46F6D744/

No, that looks like textures missing. Try verifying you have a complete copy and restart KSP. If that doesn't work please head over to Support

Fresh installs for major updates, folks! It's the only way to fly*!

*without everything breaking
Let the mod recompile frenzy begin.

Planned for beta, but not this release.

Ah, I was under the impression that this was what we would get and that would be it. Good to know there is more to come (outside multiplayer).

Let the mod recompile frenzy begin.

Yee-haw! I'm also anxious about a few mods and whether or not they'll update before my christmas break starts

Don't get me wrong I'm super excited. But I literally just finished my f-22 after like 50 hours. I'm terrified to go home and try and load it into .9.

Super excited for everything else though. Editor update & gizmos will be fantastic.

* Added cheat menu option to visualize biomes in map view.

Hey Kasper, jot down for future: "Level # Scientist Skill: Can see biomes on map view"

I'm gonna abuse that cheat more than I'd like to admit.
YES!!!!!!! Thks Squad Team!

* Added cheat menu option to visualize biomes in map view.

Hey Kasper, jot down for future: "Level # Scientist Skill: Can see biomes on map view"

I'm gonna abuse that cheat more than I'd like to admit.

Are there any ethical objections to that then? Haha. I definitely like your suggestion though, but you'd need to be able to switch views.

I don't think this is normal?

http://cloud-4.steampowered.com/ugc/538508994144833201/081DB42FAD0E352D6979EF84A6D1350E46F6D744/

It is the .tga loading bug. Just checked the type of tex.

OK, the whole editor move part is so pure win!

im now able to just move whatever i want wherever (just made a hovercraft with wheels offset by alot). Also cuts down part count as i nolonger am forced to stick a cubic strut every time i need to have x part stuck at x location, just attach it like normal radially or whatnot, and then move it as needed!

This is amazing!

!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Umm, so I tried playing on the 64bit exe, and the builldings in career show as fully upgraded from the start, while not actually functioning as fully upgraded. In 32 bit everything is fine. o_O

Cheers:

Editor gizmos are awesome even if you aren't a part clipper.

Mk3 parts are gorgeous and functional.

Part count and vessel mass available in the VAB.

Jeers:

Computed vessel mass includes mass from massless parts.
Did I miss something? Or is it the level 0 buildings that are missing yet? Or are they complete unexpectedly?

I come home from, school, go to my friends house, open my iPad, and see that the pages in the .90 hype train thread has reached 111 pages. Then I scream and dance around the room, screaming "0.90 IS OUT!"

Then i I realize everyone is staring at me.

Edited December 20, 2014 by Rolanvorxariat

Umm, so I tried playing on the 64bit exe, and the builldings in career show as fully upgraded from the start, while not actually functioning as fully upgraded. In 32 bit everything is fine. o_O

Yes, that's a known bug.

ESA Flags ! Suprise , good Suprise!!! I will bring the ESA forward to explore space really deep! Spending much more Funds than the real ESA would...

Europe !!!!

Cheers:

Jeers:

Computed vessel mass includes mass from massless parts.

MM to edit physicsless parts to have mass 0 ?

Yes, that's a known bug.

Great, does that mean I won't get to play 0.90 career on 64 bit?

MM to edit physicsless parts to have mass 0 ?

That might work, good idea! Anyone have such a MM cfg?

Great, does that mean I won't get to play 0.90 career on 64 bit?

Well my advise would be to try it on 32 bit, especially this close after release when you're very likely not modded beyond the memory limit yet as the mods haven't updated.

Wait, so... you can't upgrade buildings in existing career saves?

Darn

Wait, so... you can't upgrade buildings in existing career saves?

Darn

You should be able to edit your savefile to 'downgrade' the buildings.
Well,then I hope that they'll fix that until the mods I wanted to use for this career are updated. If not, back to modding 32 bit it is
